pokemon.name: Venusaur
pokemon.evolution: Venusaur evolves from Ivysaur at level 32. It can mega evolve into Mega Venusaur using the Venusaurite.

pokemon.name: Charizard
pokemon.evolution: Charizard evolves from Charmeleon starting at level 36. It is the final form of Charmander.

pokemon.name: Butterfree
pokemon.evolution: Butterfree evolves from Metapod at level 10 and is the final evolution of Caterpie.

pokemon.name: Beedrill
pokemon.evolution: Beedrill is the final evolution of Weedle and evolves from Kakuna at level 10. Beedrill gains a Mega Evolution in Omega Ruby and Alpha Sapphire.

pokemon.name: Fearow
pokemon.evolution: Fearow evolves from Spearow at level 20.

pokemon.name: Nidoqueen
pokemon.evolution: Nidoqueen is the evolved form of a Nidorina by use of a Moon Stone, and is the final form of a Nidoran.

pokemon.name: Venomoth
pokemon.evolution: Venomoth is the evolved form of Venonat as of level 31.

pokemon.name: Wigglytuff
pokemon.evolution: Wigglytuff is the evolved form of Jigglypuff by the use of a Moon Stone. Wigglytuff is the final form of Igglybuff.

pokemon.name: Jynx
pokemon.evolution: Jynx is the evolved form of Smoochum as of level 30.
